titles.title: A concurrent resolution requiring that the pledge of allegiance to the United States flag be rendered in the Hall of the House at the start of each legislative day.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 7/14/1988--Introduced. Amends rule XXIV and rule I of the Rules of the House of Representatives to require the rendering of the Pledge of Allegiance in the House at the start of each legislative day.
